mapper.sql: id, code, cn_name, en_name, online_order_cny_price, online_order_usd_price, online_order_eur_price, online_normail_delivery_days, online_express_delivery_days, online_express_delivery_cny_price, online_express_delivery_usd_price, online_express_delivery_eur_price, offline_order_cny_price, offline_order_usd_price, offline_order_eur_price, offline_normail_delivery_days, offline_express_delivery_days, offline_express_delivery_cny_price, offline_express_delivery_usd_price, offline_express_delivery_eur_price,is_enable,continent_id, online_full_order_cny_price, online_full_order_usd_price, online_full_order_eur_price, online_full_normail_delivery_days, online_full_express_delivery_days, online_full_express_delivery_cny_price, online_full_express_delivery_usd_price, online_full_express_delivery_eur_price
mapper.select:
select
from country
and cn_name like concat('%', #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and en_name like concat('%', #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and continent_id = #{continentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by en_name

select id, code, cn_name, en_name from country where cn_name like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or en_name like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or code like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') order by en_name limit #{pageSize}

select
from country where continent_id = #{continentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by en_name
select id,code,cn_name,en_name from country where is_enable = 'æ˜¯' order by en_name

update country

en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

offline_express_delivery_eur_price = #{offlineExpressDeliveryEurPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
continent_id = #{continentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from country c where c.continent_id = #{id}
